GS41lagrvvju:7: ṣaṣṭyā ṣaṣṭyā yutaṃ dvābhyāṃ parvaṇāṃ rāśir ucyate // 4
GS41lagrvvju:8: svar ākramete somārkau yadā sākaṃ savāsavau /
GS41lagrvvju:9: syāt tadādi yugaṃ māghastapaḥ śuklo 'yanaṃ hy udak // 5
GS41lagrvvju:15: caturthaṃ daśamaṃ ca dviryugmādyaṃ bahule 'py ṛtau // 8
GS41lagrvvju:16: vasus tvaṣṭā bhavo 'jaś ca mitraḥ sarpāśvinau jalam /
GS41lagrvvju:17: dhātā kaś cāyanādyāś cārthapañcamabhas tv ṛtuḥ // 9
GS41lagrvvju:22: tryaṃśo bhaśeṣo divasāṃśabhāgaś caturdaśaś cāpy anīya bhinnam /
GS41lagrvvju:23: bhārdhe 'dhike cāpi gate paro 'ṃśo dvāv uttamaikaṃ pnavakairavedyam // 12
GS41lagrvvju:24: pakṣāt pañcadaśāc cordhvaṃ tadbhuktam iti nirdiśet /
GS41lagrvvju:26: jau drā ghaḥ khe śve 'hī ro ṣā cin mū ṣa ṇyaḥ sū mā dhā ṇaḥ /
GS41lagrvvju:27: re mṛ ghrāḥ svā 'po 'jaḥ kṛ ṣyo ha jye ṣṭhā ittṛkṣā liṅgaiḥ // 14
GS41lagrvvju:29: bhādānaṃ syāt caturdaśyāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ devinā kalāḥ // 15
GS41lagrvvju:30: kalā daśa saviṃśā syāt dve muhūrtasya nāḍike /
GS41lagrvvju:31: dyutriṃśat tatkalānāṃ tu ṣaṭchatī tryadhikaṃ bhavet // 16
GS41lagrvvju:32: nāḍike dve muhūrtas tu pañcāśatpalam āḍhakam /
GS41lagrvvju:33: āḍhakāt kumbhako droṇaḥ kuṭapair vardhate tribhiḥ // 17
GS41lagrvvju:34: sasaptakaṃ bhayuk somaḥ sūryo dyūni trayodaśa /
GS41lagrvvju:35: navabhāni ca pañcāhnaḥ kāṣṭhāḥ pañcākṣarāḥ smṛtāḥ // 18
GS41lagrvvju:37: staryān māsān ṣaḍabhyastān vidyāc cāndramasān ṛtun // 19
GS41lagrvvju:41: prakṣipet tatsamūhas tu vidyād ādānikīḥ kalāḥ // 21
GS41lagrvvju:42: yad uttarasyāyanato gataṃ syāc cheṣaṃ tu yad dakṣiṇato 'yanasya /
GS41lagrvvju:43: tad ekaṣaṣṭyā dviguṇaṃ vibhaktaṃ sadvādaśaṃ syād divasapramāṇam // 22
GS41lagrvvju:44: yad ardhaṃ dinabhāgānāṃ sadā parvaṇi parvaṇi /
GS41lagrvvju:45: ṛtuśeṣaṃ tu tad vidyāt saṃkhyāya sahaparvaṇām // 23
GS41lagrvvju:49: sarpāś ca pitaraś caiva bhagaś caivāryamāpi ca // 25
GS41lagrvvju:50: savitā tvaṣṭātha vāyuś cendrāgnī mitra eva ca /
GS41lagrvvju:51: indro niṛrtir āpo vai viśvedevās tathaiva ca // 26
GS41lagrvvju:52: viṣnur vasavo varuṇo 'ja ekapāt tathaiva ca /
GS41lagrvvju:53: ahirbudhnyas tathā pūṣā aśvinau yama eva ca // 27
GS41lagrvvju:60: viṣuvaṃ tadguṇaṃ dvābhyāṃ rūpahīnaṃ tu ṣaḍguṇam /
GS41lagrvvju:61: yal labdhaṃ tāni parvāṇi tathārdhaṃ sā tithir bhavet // 31
GS41lagrvvju:65: ṣaṣṭhīṃ ca viṣuvān prokto dvādaśīṃ ca samaṃ bhavet // 33
GS41lagrvvju:66: caturdaśīm upavasathas tathā bhaved yathodito dinam upaiti candramāḥ /
GS41lagrvvju:68: yathā śikhā mayūrāṇāṃ nāgānāṃ maṇayo yathā /
